metadata.title: CVE-2021-23364 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The package browserslist from 4.0.0 and before 4.16.5 are vulnerable toRegular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) during parsing of queries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-browserslist - 4.21.3+~cs6.1.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-browserslist package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.21.3+~cs6.1.12-1').
